summary:
BET-BITCOIN - Welcome to BET-BITCOIN, the premier platform for cryptocurrency enthusiasts and experts alike. Here, you have the unique opportunity to capitalize on your insights into Bitcoin's market dynamics. If you have an intuitive grasp or analytical perspective on where Bitcoin's price might head – be it upwards or downwards – this is the platform for you.

 Nerko's Roadmap - 0%

Phase 01

Planning

Quality comes first. we took our time to plan out everything and build our production pipeline for a good quality artworks.

 How does the Bitcoin price prediction work on this platform? - Users can submit their predictions on whether they believe Bitcoin's price will rise or fall within a specified time frame. If their prediction aligns with the actual price movement, they stand a chance to win rewards.

 What data or tools do you provide to help me make an informed prediction? - Our platform offers real-time Bitcoin price charts, historical data, market analysis, and expert insights. This comprehensive information is designed to assist users in making well-informed predictions.

 How often can I make a prediction? Is there a limit? - There is no limit on how you much you want to bet.

 How do you determine if a prediction is correct? - Predictions are cross-referenced with actual market data from reputable cryptocurrency exchanges. If a user's forecast matches the actual price movement direction within the given time frame, it's deemed correct.

 How and when are rewards distributed to winners? - Rewards are distributed immediately to users whose predictions are accurate. The exact reward varies based on several factors, including the number of correct predictions frequency. Ensure your account details are updated for seamless transactions.
proposal:
Hey there Bet-Bitcoiners! 👋 We've been looking at your platform with great interest. It's clear that you've created a fantastic space for Bitcoin enthusiasts to put their market predictions to the test. We love your dedication to providing real-time data and expert insights to your users, helping them make well-informed bets. 

We're reaching out because we believe we have some tools that could further enhance your platform and community engagement. We offer a range of B2B tools, from DEX to Lottery, Wallet, Farming, DAO, CrossChain, and even IDOFactory - Launchpad. 

For instance, imagine integrating a DEX or Lottery into your platform, where your users could potentially earn more from their correct predictions. Or perhaps a multicurrency crypto wallet, supporting not just Bitcoin but other tokens as well. And how about a DAO for governance and proposals, making your platform even more community-driven?

The best part? All these tools are customizable to fit your brand, and with revenue share options, you won't have to pay a dime upfront. 

We're not here to gamble, we're here to create. Let's enhance Bet-Bitcoin together, shall we? Check out our demos at https://t.me/onoutdemos and let us know if you're interested!
